fullname: Prophet Muḥammad, peace and blessings be upon him

info: Servant of Umm Salamah and the mother of the famous scholar, Al-Hasan Al-Baṣri
Son of Khayrah Umm al-Ḥasan al-Baṣri and brother of al-Ḥasan al-Baṣri

fullname: Hind bint Abi Umayyah ibn al-Mughīrah
searchname: Umm Salamah Hind bint Abi Umayyah ibn al-Mughīrah
info: Wife of the Prophet Muḥammad ﷺ
Son of Khayrah Umm al-Hasan al-Baṣri, and famous scholar from Iraq
Wife of the Prophet ﷺand daughter of Abi Bakr, the first caliph
